name: Adidas
desc: adidas Originals has been teaming up with Parley Ocean Plastic® since 2015 to develop innovative materials from recycled bottles to help minimize the environmental effects of such waste. These retro-inspired 'ZX 10,000 C' sneakers are made from Primeblue ripstop and paneled with suede and leather. The neutral colorway will work with so many different outfits.
